lesson_01.Title: 0 - Zero
lesson_01.Memo: We also say "ništica" or "ništa" for zero. "Ništa" also means "nothing".

lesson_02.Title: 1 - One
lesson_02.Memo:
"Jedan" = "One man"
"Jedna" = "One woman, or something female"
"Jedno" = "Something of neutral gender"
"Jednom" = "Once"
"Prvi / Prva / Prvo" = "First"
"Jedinica" = "Unit", also the name of the digit 1

lesson_03.Title: 2 - Two
lesson_03.Memo:
"Dvojica" = "Two men"
"Dvije" = "Two women (or anything female)"
"Dvoje" = "Two people (male and female)"
"Drugi / Druga / Drugo" = "Second"
"Dvaput" = "Twice"
"Dvojka" = The name of the digit 2

lesson_04.Title: 3 - Three
lesson_04.Memo:
"Trojica" = "Three men"
"Tri" = "Three women (or three of anything non living)"
"Troje" = "Three people (male and female)"
"Treći / Treća / Treće" = "Third"
"Trojka" = "Group of three", also the name of the digit 3

lesson_05.Title: 4 - Four
lesson_05.Memo:
"Četvorica" = "Four men"
"Četiri" = "Four women, or four of anything non-living"
"Četvero" = "Four people, male and female"
"Četvrti / Četvrta / Četvrto" = "Fourth"
"Četvorka" = "Group of five", also the name of the digit 4

lesson_06.Title: 5 - Five
lesson_06.Memo:
"Petorica" = "5 men"
"Petero" = "5 people"
"Peti / Peta / Peto" = "Fifth"
"Petorka" = "Group of five"
"Petica" = The name of the digit 5

lesson_07.Title: 6 - Six
lesson_07.Memo:
"Šestorica" = "6 men"
"Šestero" = "6 people"
"Šesti / Šesta / Šesto" = "Sixth"
"Šestorka" = "Group of 6"
"Šestica" = The name of the digit 6

lesson_08.Title: 7 - Seven
lesson_08.Memo:
"Sedmorica" = "7 men"
"Sedmero" = "7 people"
"Sedmi / Sedma / Sedmo" = "Seventh"
"Sedmorka" = "Group of 7"
"Sedmica" = The name of the digit 7

lesson_09.Title: 8 - Eight
lesson_09.Memo:
"Osmorica" = "8 men"
"Osmero" = "8 people"
"Osmi / Osma / Osmo" = "Eighth"
"Osmorka" = "Group of 8"
"Osmica" = The name of the digit 8

lesson_10.Title: 9 - Nine
lesson_10.Memo:
"Devetorica" = "9 men"
"Devetero" = "9 people"
"Deveti / Deveta / Deveto" = "Ninth"
"Devetorka" = "Group of 9"
"Devetka" = The name of the digit 9

lesson_11.Title: 10 - Ten
lesson_11.Memo:
"Desetorica" = "10 men"
"Desetero" = "10 people"
"Deseti / Deseta / Deseto" = "Tenth"
"Desetorka" = "Group of 10"
"Desetka" = The name of the digit 10

lesson_12.Title: 11 - Eleven
lesson_12.Memo:
"Jedanaestorica" = "11 men"
"Jedanaestero" = "11 people"
"Jedanaesti / Jedanaesta / Jedanaesto" = "Eleventh"
"Jedanaestorka" = "Group of 11"
"Jedanaestica" = The name of the digit 11

lesson_13.Title: 12 - Twelve
lesson_13.Memo:
"Dvanaestorica" = "12 men"
"Dvanaestero" = "12 people"
"Dvanaesti / Dvanaesta / Dvanaesto" = "Twelfth"
"Dvanaestorka" = "Group of 12"
"Dvanaestica" = The name of the digit 12

lesson_14.Title: 13 - Thirteen
lesson_14.Memo:
"Trinaestorica" = "13 men"
"Trinaestero" = "13 people"
"Trinaesti / Trinaesta / Trinaesto" = "Thirteenth"
"Trinaestorka" = "Group of 13"
"Trinaestica" = The name of the digit 13

lesson_15.Title: 20 - Twenty
lesson_15.Memo:
"Dvadesetorica" = "20 men"
"Dvadesetero" = "20 people"
"Dvadeseti / Dvadeseta / Dvadeseto" = "Twentieth"
"Dvadesetorka" = "Group of 20"
"Dvadesetica" = The name of the digit 20

lesson_16.Title: 25 - Twenty five
lesson_16.Memo:
"Dvadesetpetorica" = "25 men"
"Dvadesetpetero" = "25 people"
"Dvadesetpeti / Dvadesetpeta / Dvadesetpeto" = "Twenty-fifth"
"Dvadesetpetorka" = "Group of 25"
"Dvadesetpetica" = The name of the digit 25

lesson_17.Title: 99 - Ninety nine
lesson_17.Memo:
"Devedesetdevetorica" = "99 men"
"Devedesetdevetero" = "99 people"
"Devedesetdeveti / Devedesetdeveta / Devedesetdeveto" = "Ninety-ninth"
"Devedesetpetorka" = "Group of 99"
"Devedesetdevetka" = The name of the digit 99

lesson_18.Title: 100 - Hundred
lesson_18.Memo: We also say "stotinu". The name of the digit is "stotica" ili "stotka".

lesson_20.Title: 1000 - Thousand
lesson_20.Memo: For a million we say "milijun", and for a billion we say "milijarda".

lesson_21.Title: 1/2 - Half
lesson_21.Memo:
"Poluvrijeme" = "Half time" (in sports)
"Pola sata" = "Half an hour"
"Pola pet" = "Half past four" (note: "pet" means 5)
